refInsert: Automatically inserts the reference ID into Nexvia links while typing in the description section.
uiCleaner: Enables the UI cleaner to hide unused or distracting elements from the interface.
photoResizer: Introduces a resizing UI to the photos section, and alerts when property photos deviate from the 3:2 aspect ratio.
fullWidth: Ensures the description field is shown in full width for easier editing.
listingHelper: Enables importing listing data directly from Trello, with streamlined copy/paste functionality for ultra-fast listing creation.
